May 7, 2011 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section)

May 10, 2011, 12:34 a.m. June 30, 2020, 12:30 p.m.

3 Treherbert & District Band Craig Roberts A Little Light Music

Withdrawn Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
